1.content:
You are walking through the city of Elysium, Home of the Angel's, when you are struck with a message. "Report to the Council Chambers, we have a mission for you." With a wicked grin you about face, unfold your wings and take off towards the Chambers. Upon arrival, you are ushered inside and seated infront of the council. "There are reports of a demon in a school on Sol-3, and we need you to go and capture the demon. This demon belongs to the inner levels of hell and it is using the human females as vessels for some hybrid demons. This needs to be handled discreetly... do you understand?" Rising from your seat you bow to the councilors and accept. "Good... now go to the armory and choose your weapons and armor. You'll need them." You bow your self out and walk to the armory. Your story begins now but... Who are you?

-Class Prime Huntress: Name Angela, Height 6' 0. Weapon Dimensional Lance. Armor Color Blood Red Power Mind Control (nothing extreme like kill yourself)

-Class Trickster: Name Nyx, Height 5' 8. Weapon Nodachi. Armor Color Midnight Black . Power Body Morph. (Can change body into other forms, human animal and can mimic other bodies or just change part of body, retina, skin, fingernail length, ETC.)

-Class Animal: Name Alyra, Height 6' 2. Weapon Mace. Armor Color Dark Green . Enhanced Senses and Super Human Strength.

-Class Muse: Name Calliope, Height 5' 6. Weapon Gladius and Shield. Armor Color Sky Blue Power Possession.

-Make your own Angel.
1.title: Genesis

choices: You wake up in the Nurse's office, (Remember who you are, Powers were stolen)
You wake up in the yard. (Think your a Student, All powers)
11.content:
You walk into the Armory, not really caring about the mission, just praying for a vacation. Eventually you finish getting your armor on and pushing a pair of blood red shades on your face. You unfold your wings and take off just circling the sky when a message strikes your brain the same way the first did.

"Hey.. Angela... Angela... Council says to reinstate your essence.. It might be fun just to mess up some thoughts on this trip." You suck your teeth and block out the message. You blink a few times as you begin riding the flow of natural essence. It's a extremely arousing feeling becoming one with the entire angel population. All their thoughts and feelings merge with yours for a brief moment as you become pure light and vanish from Elysium. A sharp feeling of pain passes through your body as you reform on a completely different world. You look around and notice the subtle differences between Sol-3 and Elysium. You think of just forgetting the job and living your life on earth as you catch a putrid stench. You keel over as the smell ravages your nostrils. Following the horrible aroma you eventually come across a High School.

You step up to the school and look around. There is no one in the yard so it has to be after 12 noon. Hopping over the school gate you look around and pull in your wings. Looking around you tap a button on your shades and see a projection of what you look like at the moment. "Hmm.. passable." You look like a young teen. Long Red flowing hair, Black Rimmed glasses on. A black skirt, with red roses on it and a white button down with bleach white rosettes around the collar. You could actually pass for a human, in this state. Pressing a second button on your shades you feel a backpack appear on your back. Stepping towards the school again you are struck with a hard blow to the head. A massive wave of essence, more powerful than your own, is assaulting and smothering your entire body. You try to fight it but it's overpowering you. You can feel it force it's way down your throat as your breathing becomes short and raspy. You fall to your knees as a dark vision fills your mind. Falling backwards you black out dropping your bag and your shades to the floor.

What happened next?
11.title: Huntress

choices: Go back to the yard where
112.content:
A twitch went through your head. All you could see was black. A flash of white light, like lightning, filled your eyes. You could hear a hum. You open your eyes, burning from the sunlight. A middle-aged woman is hovering over you with a stethoscope. "Miss? Miss, can you hear me?" She crouched over you and shined a tiny light into your eyes, peeling your eyelid. You blink and say "Yes".

She tries to help to your feet. But, you stumble with the first few steps. "C'mon now, We need to get you to a bed." Your body feels very drowsy and head begins to bob. "Just a little farther" the nurse encourages. At last, she sets you down onto a flat cushioned surface.

"Can you tell me what happened? Let's see...Angela, is it? Please dear, lie down. Now, tell me." "I don't know what happened...I remember arriving at the school. I went through the gate...There was anyone around...and then." A shriek rang through your head. Your head began to ache and throb. "Then what?" the nurse asks. "Then...I woke up."

The nurse turned around toward her desk. "I think you should stay here for awhile. Maybe you should go home for the day. I'll call her parents" the nurse states. You sit up. "No! Don't call my parents. I'm fine. I can go to class." The nurse puts down the phone and says "Ok. You're fine. Go to class now." You stare at her mystified. You grab your backpack and leave the nurse's office.
112.title: You wake up in the yard. (Think your a Student,...

choices: Wake up in the Nurses Office (Amnesia)
Wake up in a strange Bedroom (Amnesia)
Wake up in the Basement (Full Memory)
12.content: You walk into the Armory, picking up your usual gear, and going over plans to do on Sol-3. "Shopping for Earth Clothes... The Beach.. A couple boys... maybe even a couple girls... Only the Metatron can tell." When you finished suiting up you walked out of the armory with a wide smile on your face before you were stopped by a soft voice. "Hey.. Nyx." As you turn around you see your Older Sister, Persephone, carrying a necklace. "Nyx... Council says to reinstate your essence.. stealth is a key factor this trip." You're smile grew as did your plans. Taking the jet black necklace and putting it around your neck, you feel your essence flow through your veins. Nodding to your sister you unfold your wings and take off. Before long you click the center piece on your armor. As you do your body becomes pure light and vanishes. When you reform you are back on Sol-3 and ready to party. Hiding your wings, you walk out trying to hone in on the demon's scent. Following the horrible aroma you eventually come across a High School. "Jackpot... Hormonally charged Teenagers... I'm blessed." Stepping towards the school, you suddenly feel something. A massive wave of essence, more powerful than your own and its smothering you! You try to fight it, but its inevitable. On a last ditch desperate idea you hit the jewel on your armor and translate through the energy hoping for the best.
12.title: Trickster

121.content:
" Hnnnnmmm", you groan, opening your eyes. Bright lights stung them and made your head swim. "Oohh. What happened?"

"You were found out in the parking lot unconscious. We brought you in to keep an eye on you." You start to look around for the source of the voice when she came into view. She wore a thin white coat over slim shoulders and a casual blouse. Your eyes were drawn to hers, noticing how kind they looked and how at ease they made you."So, since we found you unconscious, we have to check for a concussion. Here, follow my finger," she said holding one up. She moved it up and down, left and right, and closer then further away.

"Good news, no concussion," she sat back in her rolling chair,"you have very pretty eyes. They almost seemed to change colors. Now, what is your name, honey?"

"I'm...I'm not sure." Your voice comes out in a nice medium tone. " Your parents having trouble, huh? That's alright, I just wanted your first name. "

"I don't know that either. I don't even know how many names I've had. I can't remember anything!"

"Now, now. There must be something? How did you get to the school?" You try to dig deep for anything about yourself, "I had something very important to do. But I..."

"It's okay, hun. Well, you had this pack with you when we found you and the notebook has Nyx on the front. Does that sound like your name?"

"No... maybe it's a nickname. Nyx...Nyx... Something like it though. Onyx? Alex? Yeah...that sounds right, Alex." You smile slightly, thankful that you have some piece of yourself back. You feel a warmth in your chest and hear a high pitched ringing in your ears. The nurse asked you to stay there while she went to ask the secretary about any new students named Alex.

When she was gone you went over to the small bathroom to look in the mirror. Looking back at you was a face that seemed wrong, it had no distinguishing features to tell if you were male or female. It was a perfect medium. All except for the eyes, they were soft and kind like the nurse's. You liked that you had the same kind eyes. Greenish blue with a hint of violet on the edges. Looking farther down, you saw a jet black gem, fastened in a wire clasp with a silver necklace running off each side and up around your neck. It felt like it was a part of you, like it meant something to you specifically. You reach up to touch it when you heard the nurse come back. As you turn, you catch something out of the corner of your eye. A shadow of something on your back. You look again but it's gone.

"So, it turns out that your name is Alex Angelou and you just transferred from a Church school to here. Your father is away most of the time and you live with your uncle. Is any of this ringing a bell?" You feel that you have got to move on, so you lie, "yeah, it is. I was...skipping the rest of the day when someone attacked ear I didn't see their face, but they hit me over the head." You reach up to touch one of your temples and winced when you brushed the skin. A large tender bump the size of a half dollar, sat just above your right ear. "Here, let me look at that." The woman with the kind eyes took your chin in her hand," It doesn't seem too bad. I think you'll be fine. Stop by the front desk and pick up up your new schedule."

You agreed and left with your backpack. Your schedule had 5 classes on it and today was half over. Your next class was________
121.title: Wake up in the Nurses Office (Amnesia)

1211.content:
Your next class is gym. You glanced at the clock above the lockers, and the bell rang. Surprisingly quickly, the hallway was flooded with teenagers going in every direction. You tried to ask where the gym was but nobody seemed to notice you. They all just past you without a second glance, all except for one guy. He was standing near his locker putting some books away while watching you try to ask for help. When he finished, he walked over asking, "Hey, there. You need some help?"

"Yeah," you handed him your schedule. While he looked it over, you look him over. He was about an inch taller than you with shaggy brown hair haphazardly combed back. He was wearing a thin zip up hoodie and faded jeans with grubby sneakers. "So it looks like you have gym next"

" I figured that out, but I don't know where it is. "

"Oh, well it's just this way. I'll take you there." He motioned down a side hall. You hiked up your backpack strap and hurried to follow. He led you passed the cafeteria and the band room. "Here is the gym. I'd go to the coaches room and ask for a lock to use."

"Thanks, is gym your next class too?"

He smiled,"No, I've got band. See ya round." He waved and took off. You made your way to a little room off to the side of the gym. In it, you find a man and a woman in athletic clothing. You knock on the door to get their attention, "Yes?"

"Hi, I'm Alex. I was told to come here for a lock." They checked a clipboard and found a lock for you. They also handed you a ______ gym uniform.
1211.title: gym

14.content: You walk into the Armory, and adorn your armor while going over strategies, for slaying the demon. "Nasty Bastard... probably seducing those young women..." When you finished suiting up you walked out of the armory before you were stopped. "Good afternoon, Cali" As you turn around you see your Older Sister, Persephone, carrying a necklace. "Council says to reinstate your essence.. You might need to go very deep undercover." You're smile grew as you bowed to your elder. Taking the silver necklace and putting it around your neck, you feel your essence flow through your veins. It's a wonderful feeling, having this raw energy flowing through you. Returning to sanity, you unfold your wings and take off. You close your eyes and focus on Sol-3. As you do your body becomes pure light and vanishes. When you reform you are back on Sol-3, ready to preserve the peace. You eventually come across a High School. "Foul Demon... Your death approaches." Stepping towards the school, you suddenly feel something. A massive wave of essence, more powerful than your own and its smothering you! You try to fight it, but its inevitable. You concentrate hard enough and become light once more. You don't know where you're going.. but your going their fast.
14.title: Muse

choices: You figure out that you possessed her.
You freak out and eject yourself from her body.
141.content:
"Oh god... m.. my head is killing me..." Sitting up you look around your environment. You have absolutely no idea where you are, but for some reason, it's a familiar setting. Forcing yourself up, you look around to see a face staring back at yours. Looking into the face for a moment your surprised when it suddenly, blinks and smiles.

"Hi! My name is Noir! Are you okay? You've been laying down there... for... a long time... school's over now..." She said a bit rapid-fire. Noir had short grey hair, dark skin and candy green eyes. She was about 5 foot 7 a bit tall for a girl her stature. She was wearing the school's traditional Monochromatic Sailor Fuku, type uniform. She had about... C cup breasts... athletic arms and legs and she had a black star tattoo under her right eye, which for some odd reason was familiar to you as well.

You just smile at her for a moment before a heavy thump, ripples through your skull. Grabbing your head you fall back on one knee and scrunch up your eyes, trying to block out the pain. Noir just looks around the school yard, screaming for help as you continue writhing and screaming on the ground. A surge of excitement flows through you as the pain suddenly subsided and was turned into immediate pleasure. It was an addictive pleasure.

"Is this... death?" Seeing a light ahead of you, you rush towards it, feeling the pleasure increase the closer you get. Eventually you burst through the light and the pleasure subsides, but is replaced with a warm feeling. Blinking a bit, it took you a moment to realize that you could see the world around you once again. And Yet, you feel off. Looking down you see a black and white school uniform, a smaller chest and a darker skin. Putting 2 and 2 together, you figured out that you had become Noir! But how?
141.title: No Memories, School yard.

15.content: Class: Swordsman: Name Hanako,Height 5' 4. Weapon: Longsword Armor Color: Light Red Power: Enhanced Senses
15.title: Your Own

info.brief_description: On assignment from heaven, you are relieved of your memories and must regain them or die.
info.description:
You are an angel on assignment from the heavens to capture and kill a demon, that is living on earth. You are given powers that could help on your mission but only if you choose them. How will you hunt?

-Sexuality is fine (sex, yuri, yaoi) But if you have sex... keep it short... and sweet... nothing over the top that could damn well take up 2 pages.

-No killing the Angel

-No leaving the school grounds.

-Personality swaps are okay... but none in the beginning of the story... gradually build them please.

-Have fun with it.

-Gift points will be handed out accordingly... I guess.
